entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 2:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
Temperature: 7.2°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 6.7°C
Wind: NNE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Rain except periods of snow over western sections in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature steady near 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow except rain over eastern sections. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
